cinnamon.engine.utils

Interface AlignableEntity

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Entity, MovableEntity, Partitionable, Position, Rotation, Size
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    PolygonEntity

    public interface AlignableEntity
extends MovableEntity
    Created by chris on 6/10/2017.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  AlignableEntity.Alignment
      Directions for describing how an AlignableEntity object should be positioned relative to a target.

    • Method Detail

      • alignTo

        default void alignTo(Bounds target,
                     AlignableEntity.Alignment... alignments)

        Moves to a position relative to a target Bounds as described by the given AlignableEntity.Alignment.

        This method incurs the same effects as calling any of the move methods (e.g. MovableEntity.moveTo(float, float)) such as notifying all attached ObservablePosition.OnPositionListeners.

        Parameters:
        target - Rect to position from.
        alignments - relative position.

      • alignTo

        default void alignTo(Entity target,
                     AlignableEntity.Alignment... alignments)

        Moves to a position relative to a target Entity as described by the given AlignableEntity.Alignment.

        This method incurs the same effects as calling any of the move methods (e.g. MovableEntity.moveTo(float, float)) such as notifying all attached ObservablePosition.OnPositionListeners.

        Parameters:
        target - Entity to position from.
        alignments - relative position.

      • alignTo

        default void alignTo(float targetX,
                     float targetY,
                     AlignableEntity.Alignment... alignments)

        Moves to a position relative to a point as described by the given AlignableEntity.Alignment.

        This method incurs the same effects as calling any of the move methods (e.g. MovableEntity.moveTo(float, float)) such as notifying all attached ObservablePosition.OnPositionListeners.

        Parameters:
        targetX - target x.
        targetY - target y.
        alignments - relative position.

      • computeAlignedX

        static float computeAlignedX(int flags,
                             float x,
                             float width,
                             float targetX,
                             float targetWidth)

        Computes the x position after alignment with a target x and target width.

        Parameters:
        flags - alignment flags.
        x - current x.
        width - width.
        targetX - target x.
        targetWidth - target width.
        Returns:
        aligned x.

      • computeAlignedY

        static float computeAlignedY(int flags,
                             float y,
                             float height,
                             float targetY,
                             float targetHeight)

        Computes the y position after alignment with a target y and target height.

        Parameters:
        flags - alignment flags.
        y - current y.
        height - height.
        targetY - target y.
        targetHeight - target height.
        Returns:
        aligned y.

      • containsAlignment

        static boolean containsAlignment(int flags,
                                 AlignableEntity.Alignment alignment)

        Checks if a packed int contains the bit flag associated with an AlignableEntity.Alignment.

        Parameters:
        flags - packed bits.
        alignment - alignment.
        Returns:
        true if alignment's bit flag is in the packed int.

      • createPackedFlags

        static int createPackedFlags(AlignableEntity.Alignment... alignments)

        Builds an int packed with the given AlignableEntity.Alignment's bit flags.

        Parameters:
        alignments - alignments.
        Returns:
        bit flags as int.
